feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing planned features, affected files, and component versions.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light/dark OKLCH color tokens and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component composing Hero, Quiz, and Closing sections with navigation.
frontend/src/components/DedicationLayout: Reusable layout wrapper applying consistent container spacing.
frontend/src/components/quiz/Celebration: Full‑screen confetti, burst, and sparkle animation overlay triggered by quiz events.
frontend/src/components/sections/Closing: Closing section displaying final message, ornament, signature, and footer attribution.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero section with background image, dedication text, illustration, and primary photo with fallback.
frontend/src/components/sections/LetterS: Letter section rendering dedication paragraphs using shared content config.
frontend/src/components/sections/Moments: Grid‑based memories section showing titled moment cards with dates and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/sections/QuizSec: Implements an interactive quiz component with answer handling, celebration effects, score calculation, and result display.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Sticky top navigation with scroll-based styling and smooth anchor navigation.
frontend/src/content/dedicationContent.t: Provides centralized site content including hero text, quiz questions and results, a heartfelt letter, and moments entries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the user's Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, providing login, logout, and identity persistence through a React context.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes with a warm color palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with react-query and the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugin integrations for the project.
project_state.json: Tracks project schema, version, goals, image requirements, architectural notes, and known issues for building a dedication website with a quiz and teddy-bear sticker.
